titles.title: Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park Redesignation Act
Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park Redesignation Act
A bill to redesignate the Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site as the "Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park", and for other purposes.
Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park Redesignation Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park Redesignation Act
This bill redesignates the Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site, in New Hampshire, as the "Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park."
